description:
After the lady at the convenience store is attacked by an invisible individual and killed, an Emergency Shinobi Notice is sent out and an investigation is launched in an effort to ascertain the identity of the culprit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meow Meow, Meow Meow, Meow Meow Meow Meow Meow?
Onya Nya, Nyannya, Nya Nya Nya Nyannya?
オニャニャ, ニャンニャ, ニャニャニャニャンニャ?
